name: Train Engine Wash: Toddler Train Sim
name_original: Train Engine Wash: Toddler Train Sim
description:
Welcome to the kids fantasy world, where you wash magnificent train engines. You know these train engine work long
hours, travel hundreds of kilometers , carry hundreds of passenger. Then they do get dirty, dusty and bad. Engines are
really messed up, very muddy, Very messy.
Get them into the Special train engine washing salon, Wash the dirt, dust and any thing bad. Apply soap, use water,
Shine them and get them ready to work again for people.
This rust, exhausted Train will thank you for this great service.

How Train Engine Wash Works
-> Use Water to remove mud
-> Use soap to remove stains
-> Use Sponge to clean the dirt
-> Dry the train engine using blower
-> Apply Polish to shine
